data.title: Charlie Chan Carries On
data.meta_description: Hardcover. Reprint. Cover art by Mary Briggs. Owner name on front fly with toned pages, boards lightly rubbed and edgeworn, very good in a sunned and edgeworn, about very good dust jacket with tiny chips and tears, and splitting along the front flap fold. The basis for the lost film of the same name featuring the first appearance of Warner Oland as Charlie Chan, and the film that popularized the series. Item #529445
data.text:
Hardcover. Reprint. Cover art by Mary Briggs. Owner name on front fly with toned pages, boards lightly rubbed and edgeworn, very good in a sunned and edgeworn, about very good dust jacket with tiny chips and tears, and splitting along the front flap fold. The basis for the "lost film" of the same name featuring the first appearance of Warner Oland as Charlie Chan, and the film that popularized the series.

Item #529445
